hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
cd $HOME/HOME/Evea_GestSup; USER=lesmetives_aloa PASS=Palmier-10 HOST=ftp.lesmetives.com
wget -mnH --cut-dirs=3 ftp://$USER:$PASS@$HOST/public/www/logistique -X public/www/logistique/.git
git add . -v git commit -m 'Sauvegarde journaliere' | true git push origin master -f | true
WPNAME='Evea_GestSup' WPDBVERSION=`` WPPLUGIN=`` URL='http://lesmetives.com/logistique/' TYPE='' SERV='' curl http://aloa:Palmier-10@monit.aloa.ovh/RapportsMonitoring/post.php -X POST -d "type=$TYPE&name=$WPNAME&version=$WPDBVERSION&plugin=$WPPLUGIN&url=$URL&serveur=$SERV"
